backend/main.mo: Defines actor with admin auth, storage maps, and typed models for vehicles, promotions, blog posts, leads, media, and stats using mixins for auth and blob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence for admin auth overhaul and session‑token guarding with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries of numerous frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme file defining CSS variables for light and dark modes plus global styling.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the SPA and loading the main TypeScript entrypoint.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Protects admin routes using session-token validation and redirects unauthenticated users to the login page.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Provides admin dashboard layout with sidebar navigation and logout handling via session-token auth.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Implements admin session persistence using localStorage and cookies with helpers for getting, setting, and clearing tokens.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied message with a button redirecting users to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts with fields for content, metadata, and image selection.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with optional loading state.
Generic CRUD table component with search, status display, and edit/delete action buttons.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Displays, searches, and deletes media assets with preview thumbnails and a confirmation dialog.
Provides a searchable dialog to browse and select a media asset by URL.
Handles file selection and uploads media as a data URL, triggering a mutation and optional callback.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog for adding or editing promotions with fields for details, validity date, and image selection.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog for creating or editing testimonials including customer info, review, rating, and image.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Dialog for managing vehicle entries with fields for specs, media, pricing, and commercial options.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on media, contacts, credit simulations, and visitor stats via an admin actor.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session validation, login, and logout using actor API calls and stored session tokens.
Renders the admin login form, performs authentication, and redirects authenticated users.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Loads, edits, and saves the admin user's profile using query hooks and form state.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Blog management page with CRUD operations, search filtering, and dialogs for editing, creating, and deleting blog posts.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard displaying summary statistics for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, and credit simulations.
Admin interface for viewing, searching, and deleting contact form submissions and credit simulations with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media management page showing upload controls, error alerts, and a panel listing media assets.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Promotions management page supporting CRUD operations, search filtering, and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting promotions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Testimonials admin page providing CRUD functionality with search filtering and dialogs for editing and deleting testimonials.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Vehicle management page with category-based filtering, search, and dialogs for creating, editing, and deleting vehicles.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Admin page that displays visitor statistics and provides a form to update BigInt-based stats via CMS hooks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures all public and admin routes with TanStack Router, wrapping admin routes in AdminGuard and layouts.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form for submitting contact inquiries, validating required fields, and sending data through a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests with required fields and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: React error boundary that catches global UI errors and shows a fallback screen with a reload button.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing dealer info, contact details, social links, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Public page layout including navbar, optional hero, footer, CTA sections, and visitor tracking.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Mobile bottom bar with call, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and menu actions using sheets.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Slide-up sheet showing navigation links and closing on selection.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Responsive navbar with links, logo, WhatsApp button, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: CTA section with headline and WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Simple hero banner with title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Displays vehicle details, features, pricing, and provides consult and detail buttons.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating vehicles, promotions, blog posts, interactions, and more.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views using mutations and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for theming in light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Fetches and renders a single blog post with SEO updates and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Displays a grid of blog posts fetched from the API with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Shows detailed info for a commercial vehicle with like/share actions and feature badges.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Lists commercial vehicles categorized into light duty, medium duty, and tractor head groups.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form and static contact details including location and consultant info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page with banners, featured vehicles, search, about section, and latest blog posts.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays details for a passenger vehicle with variant selection, pricing, and like/share actions.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all passenger vehicles with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Shows current promotions with images, descriptions, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Displays customer testimonials with ratings, photos, and reviews.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project's architecture, features, known issues, and migration-safety requirements for an auto company website with CMS and admin systems.
